body_html:
It was resolved by adding the following lines (see here)

os.environ['TF_CONFIG'] = json.dumps({'environment': 'local'})
config = tf.contrib.learn.RunConfig()
estimator = tf.estimator.Estimator(..., config = config)
body_text:
It was resolved by adding the following lines (see here)
os.environ['TF_CONFIG'] = json.dumps({'environment': 'local'})
config = tf.contrib.learn.RunConfig()
estimator = tf.estimator.Estimator(..., config = config)
body:
It was resolved by adding the following lines (see [here](https://stackoverflow.com/questions/45952149/tensorflow-estimator-periodic-evaluation-on-eval-dataset/))
```
os.environ['TF_CONFIG'] = json.dumps({'environment': 'local'})
config = tf.contrib.learn.RunConfig()
estimator = tf.estimator.Estimator(..., config = config)
```
